category: news
title: "AI system self-organizes to develop features of brains of complex organisms"
excerpt: "Cambridge scientists have shown that placing physical constraints on an artificially-intelligent system—in much the same way that the human brain has to develop and operate within physical and biological constraints—allows it to develop features of the brains of complex organisms in order to solve tasks."
